Welcome to our new website. We hope you like our changes. Please 

note that the website is still being updated. Please let us know if you 
have any questions or if you note any errors. A Feedback 
Form is located in the pages titled "About IASP." Thank you. IMPORTANT MESSAGE: Current IASP Members: You need to 
create a NEW login and password before you 
can use this site to access the members only section of this site, 
pay your dues online, or edit your profile. You'll see the members' 

login on the left side of the screen. Click on the "first 
time?" link and enter the email address that is on file at IASP 

(most likely your work email). Please do NOT use your old login 

and password . If you don't have an email address, or don't 
think you have one on file with us, simply email members@iasp-pain.org or call 
+1.206.283.0311 ext 229 and we'll help you complete your 
registration. The following IASP Staff are working hard to create this 
website: Dale Schmidt, Kris Lukkarila, Yaa Cuguano, Elizabeth 
Endres and Marleda Di Pierri. A huge thank you to all of them plus 
the back office support of Vladimir Reid and Jeff Spring at TSC and 
initial project manager Grace Stahre at Fuse IQ.

We are the largest multidisciplinary international association in the 
field of pain. Founded in 1973, the International Association for the 
Study of Pain® (IASP) is a non-profit professional organization 
dedicated to furthering research on pain and improving the care of 
patients with pain. Membership in IASP is open to scientists, physicians, dentists, 
psychologists, nurses, physical therapists, and other health 
professionals actively engaged in pain research and to those who have 
special interest in the diagnosis and treatment of pain. Currently IASP 
has more than 6,900 members from 106 countries. home login members Source Code Copyright © 2005 by Advanced Solutions International, Inc.
